mapper.select:
select
from t_userinfo c
where 1=1
and c.id = #{id}
and c.Phone like concat ('%', #{phone},'%')
and c.Name like concat ('%', #{name},'%')
and c.IdCard like concat ('%', #{idCard},'%')
and c.Des like concat ('%', #{des},'%')
